mapper.update: update fuwu set bwid = #{bwid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fwflid = #{fwflid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fwcoding = #{fwcoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fwname = #{fwname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fwjia = #{fwjia,jdbcType=REAL}, dfbeizhu = #{dfbeizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fwstart = #{fwstart,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fwid = #{fwid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fwid, bwid, fwflid, fwcoding, fwname, duration, fwjia, dfbeizhu, fwstart from fuwu
